newsitem.title: USA: Childtime Learning Q3 Jan 3 net falls.
newsitem.headline: Childtime Learning Q3 Jan 3 net falls.

text.p: Twelve weeks ended Forty weeks ended
NOTE: Fiscal 1997 Q3 pro forma net income and earnings per share exclude $600,000 tax benefit from reversal of previous reserve.

Prior-year pro forma operating income has been adjusted exclude a previously disclosed one-time charge of $612,000 for write-down of land held for disposal. Prior-year net income and earnings per share excludes the $612,000 write-down net of a $245,000 tax benefit.

Prior-year pro forma net income, average shares and earnings per share data reflect the company's February 1996 initial public offering of 1,930,000 common shares as if the offering had occurred April 1, 1995.
Full company name is Childtime Learning Centers Inc.
